original_text:
And let them offer sacrifices of thanksgiving,
    and tell of his deeds in songs of joy!
korean_text: 감사제를 드리며 노래하여 그가 행하신 일을 선포할지로다

sentences.original_text: And let them offer sacrifices of thanksgiving
and tell of his deeds in songs of joy!
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기쁜 노래로 그의 하신 일을 전하라!
